Rust Marine Heavy Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Rust Marine Heavy Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Rust Marine Armour Set: 
 
 1. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 2. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Boots 
 3. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 4. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 5. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure lourde Rust Marine, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Rust Marine complet : 
 
 1. Rust Marine - Gilet de combat lourd 
 2. Rust Marine - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 3. Rust Marine - Gants de combat lourds 
 4. Rust Marine - Casque de combat lourd 
 5. Rust Marine - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Rust Marine; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Rust Marine-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Rust Marine - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 2. Rust Marine - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 3. Rust Marine - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 4. Rust Marine - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 5. Rust Marine - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura pesante Rust Marine, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Rust Marine: 
 
 1. Rust Marine - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 2. Rust Marine - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 3. Rust Marine - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 4. Rust Marine - casco da combattimento pesante 
 5. Rust Marine - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura Rust Marine, contiene las cinco partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Rust Marine - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 2. Rust Marine - Botas de combate pesadas 
 3. Rust Marine - Guantes de combate pesados 
 4. Rust Marine - Casco de combate pesado 
 5. Rust Marine - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 녹슨 해병 강화 방어구 세트입니다. 녹슨 해병 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투부츠 (여성)
 3. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 4. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 5. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

 1. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Women)
 2. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Boots (Women)
 3. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Gloves (Women)
 4. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Helmet (Women)
 5. Rust Marine - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

 5. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊 - 重型戰鬥護脛(女用) [#Legal]
